SLogo.View

Class CanvasViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • SLogo.View.CanvasViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, CanvasView

    public class CanvasViewImpl
extends java.util.Observable
implements CanvasView
    This class implements CanvasView to handle all View properties and Turtle properties for SLogo
